text:
Hi, I'm a tech recruiter for Rapid7. Below is a listing of our current openings in Toronto. If you're interested, you can reach me directly at samantha.oliver@rapid7.com.

All positions are ONSITE.

Software Engineer (Nexpose) http://www.rapid7.com/company/jobs.jsp?gh_jid=90889 Full stack Java, experience with Ruby a major plus.

Sr Software Development Engineer in Test (Nexpose) http://www.rapid7.com/company/jobs.jsp?gh_jid=90798 We use Ruby and Cucumber.
